welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ionia, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and savor all that Ionia has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gerald R. Ford International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Gerald R. Ford International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Gerald R. Ford International Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'GRR Free Wi-Fi' from the list of available networks.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Capital City Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is used for regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
